name: White Noise
author: 作者名字
description: White noise is a continuous, uniform noise widely used to help people relax, focus, and sleep. It masks environmental noises, improves comfort, alleviates anxiety and stress, while also enhancing concentration and sleep quality. Simply play white noise to enjoy a tranquil life.

name: Pink Noise
author: 作者名字
description: Pink noise is a type of noise that aids in relaxation, enhances focus, and improves sleep quality. It regulates brain activity, alleviates stress and anxiety, allowing you to enjoy a better quality of life.

name: Red Noise
author: 作者名字
description: Red noise aids in relaxation, enhances focus, and improves sleep quality. It balances brain activity, alleviates stress and anxiety, allowing you to enjoy a more tranquil life.

name: Blue Noise
author: 作者名字
description: Blue noise aids in relaxation, enhances focus, and improves sleep quality. It balances brain activity, alleviates stress and anxiety, allowing you to enjoy a more tranquil life.

name: Gray Noise
author: 作者名字
description: Grey noise aids in relaxation, enhances focus, and improves sleep quality. It balances brain activity, alleviates stress and anxiety, allowing you to enjoy a more tranquil life.

name: 174 Hz-Pain Relief
author: 作者名字
description: The steady low 174 Hz solfeggio frequency relieves anxiety and stress, bringing body and mind back to a state of stillness and stability. Perfect for unwinding under pressure and finding sleepless nights.

name: 285 Hz-Healing
author: 作者名字
description: The 285 Hz solfeggio frequency boosts the self-healing capabilities, stimulating self-recovery energies in tissues and cells, awakening the body’s self-healing mechanisms. Perfect for exhaustion from work pressure or lack of sleep, as well as moments when the body feels tired and weak.

name: 396 Hz-Cleanse
author: 作者名字
description: The 396 Hz solfeggio frequency dissolves fear and anxiety, helping regain inner strength and confidence, restoring a balanced, positive state of mind. Great for times of self doubt or overwhelmed by pressure.

name: 417 Hz-Release Neg
author: 作者名字
description: The 417 Hz solfeggio frequency clears away negative emotional energy, delivering refreshing and restoring energies to body and mind, dissolving suppressed and stagnant moods, gradually calming one down to embrace the goodness of life again.

name: 528 Hz-Release
author: 作者名字
description: 528 Hz is known as the “Love Frequency”, repairing damaged DNA, strengthening innate healing abilities, awakening the body's wisdom, and recalibrating life-giving forces during times of diminished vital signs.

name: 639 Hz-Love Healing
author: 作者名字
description: The 639 Hz solfeggio frequency repairs relationships, unblocking channels of communication, regaining a sense of close intimacy. Great when experiencing discord, alienation from lovers or friends, or feelings of isolation and coldness.

name: 741 Hz-EmoDetox
author: 作者名字
description: The 741 Hz solfeggio frequency awakens higher states of consciousness and intuitive wisdom, opening doorways to deeper self-awareness and intuition. Useful when facing major decisions or feeling helpless confusion.

name: 852 Hz-Clarity
author: 作者名字
description: The 852 Hz solfeggio frequency helps the body and mind return to order, rebuilding vital signs, restoring vigor. Useful when feeling totally scattered and diminished vitality.

name: 963 Hz-Awakening
author: 作者名字
description: The 963Hz solfeggio frequency activates the light body, accessing higher states of awareness, connecting to the spiritual intellect dimensions within oneself. Great when feeling the need to upgrade the soul and body.

name: Rain
author: 作者名字
description: This is a 10-minute recording of rain sounds white noise, captured during a cozy and memorable rainy night. The soothing pitter-patter contains the raw power of mother nature, which can bring an exceptional sense of tranquility.

name: Stream
author: 作者名字
description: Streams and birdsongs blending together, immerse and ease your mind. Nature's melody lifts the spirit. Perfect for relaxation after work or sleepless nights. Listen to the tunes between the hills and waters, washing over mind and body, sinking into sweet dreams.

name: Ocean
author: qiaobusi
description: Waves crashing becomes the fairest lullaby. Perfect for relaxation after work or sleepless nights. Listen, the steady, soothing waves wash away troubles, taking you to dreamlands beautiful coral reefs.

name: Night
author: 作者名字
description: Cicadas compose summer night’s serene melody. Perfect for relaxation after work or sleepless nights. Listen to nature’s lullaby, let your mind ease with the insects’ chorus into sweet dreams.

name: Bonfire
author: 作者名字
description: The crackling bonfire and cicadas chorus compose summer night’s soothing melody. Perfect for relaxation after work or sleepless nights. Listen to this natural lullaby, let your mind ease into slumber with the bonfire and insects’ summer tune.

name: Bird
author: 作者名字
description: Crisp pleasant chirping bids good morning to vibrant nature. Perfect for energizing weekday mornings or weekends waking up naturally. Listen to the cheering birdsongs, let your spirit take flight in the glorious morning.

name: Rain shelter
author: 作者名字
description: The steady soothing rain taps on the shade in a lulling rhythm. Perfect for relaxation after work or sleepless nights. Hear the taps leading you to tranquil slumber.

name: Tranquil Resonance
author: 作者名字
description: TranquilSoul Sound is woven from the melodic echoes of Tibetan bowl strikes, guiding you into a serene meditation journey to soothe the mind and restore tranquility.

name: Dreams and Change
author: Elon Musk
description: In his speech, Musk encouraged students to pursue their own dreams and passions, and to persist with courage and fortitude in the face of difficulties, because business and technology have the power to change the world.

name: Fire of Passion for Life
author: Steve Jobs
description: In his famous commencement speech at Stanford, Steve Jobs interpreted the philosophy of 'cherish your life and daringly pursue dreams' through sharing his personal experience. This speech titled 'The Fire of Passion' ignited a fiery passion for life and ideals amongst countless young people.

name: Fringe Benefits of Failure
author: J.K.Rowling
description: In her 2008 commencement address at Harvard University, J.K. Rowling eloquently expounded on deriving inspiration from failure and emphasized the crucial role of imagination in life.

name: Power Beyond Dreams
author: Jim Carrey
description: Jim Carrey shared profound insights on dreams and life during his speech at MIU University. He emphasized the importance of positive thinking, pursuing goals, and truly living one's life beyond societal expectations.

name: I Have a Dream
author: Martin Luther King
description: Martin Luther King's 'I Have a Dream' speech was delivered in 1963 at the Lincoln Memorial in Washington, D.C. The speech emphasized the principles of equality, justice, and unity.

name: Decisions and Innovation
author: Jeff Bezos
description: In this speech, Jeff Bezos shared his insights on decision-making, innovation, and life choices, encouraging graduates to pursue their passions and face uncertainty with courage. It was an inspiring talk that provided guidance for the next generation of innovators on their life journey.

name: Voice Actor Who Mimics Animals
name_c: 这位配音演员可以模仿任何动物
author: Brüder Grimm
description: Dee Bradley Baker one of Hollywood’s top voice actors.Baker specializes in creatures and animals, and you know his voice. You’ve heard him as Perry the Platypus on “Phineas and Ferb,” Klaus the Fish on “American Dad” and Daffy Duck in “Space Jam.”

name: 4 Stories About Brilliant Professors
name_c: 4 个关于杰出教授的故事
author: 作者名字
description: Welcome to Professors 101. Let’s go over the syllabus. You’re going to meet teachers at institutions of higher learning in this academic reel, and they’ve all got some curious interests. One invented the Rubik’s cube, others are hoarding chalk, others are spicing up your meals with sound.

name: Meet the Real-Life Superwoman
name_c: 认识现实生活中的女超人
author: 作者名字
description: Karenjeet Kaur Bains is the real-life Clark Kent. By day, she’s a chartered accountant and by night she transforms into superwoman, deadlifting 175 kg in her home gym.

name: 5 Stories About Clinics and Hospitals
name_c: 5 个关于诊所和医院的故事
author: 作者名字
description: This reel is in celebration of the people at the clinics and the hospitals who work to keep us all well.

name: 5 Stories That’ll Give You a Sugar Rush
name_c: 5 个让你兴奋不已的故事
author: 作者名字
description: There’s something for everyone—dippin’ dots, white strawberries grown in Japan and ice cream inspired by celebrities. We top it all off with a moving story about a World War II pilot known as the Berlin Candy Bomber.

name: Around the World in So Many Ways
author: 作者名字
description: we’re cruising the canals of Holland’s Little Venice, we’re riding with an all-female motorcycle club in New Orleans, and we’re boarding the Scottish airline Loganair for the shortest flight in the world.

name: 4 Stories About Sailing
name_c: 扬帆远航_4个关于航海的故事
author: 作者名字
description: We’re capturing the feeling of sailing in this very reel. It begins with the story of an adventurous young man on a voyage of a lifetime—sailing the high seas with his pet chicken Monique aka Momo.

name: From surfer to scientist, the story of saving the ocean
name_c: 从冲浪者到科学家，拯救我们海洋的深蓝色卫士
author: 作者名字
description: Swimming with inspiring people saving our oceans and the creatures who live in them.

name: This Is Latin Music Today
name_c: 从墨西哥流浪乐队到斯卡朋克，这就是今天的拉丁音乐
author: 作者名字
description: From to Mariachi to Ska Punk, This Is Latin Music Today

name: Making Music With Unlikely Instruments
name_c: 用不太可能的乐器创作音乐
author: 作者名字
description: We’ve met plenty of artists who have mastered traditional musical instruments like guitars, violins and pianos. But pretty much any object—from a stalactite to a carrot—can be an instrument if it’s in the right hands. Lend us your ears.

name: Stories About Circus Life
name_c: 关于马戏团生活的故事
author: 作者名字
description: We’re juggling so much at Great Big Story on any given day. But we always make time for stories about the circus.

name: Make a Record-Setting Paper Plane
name_c: 如何制作创纪录的纸飞机
author: 作者名字
description: If you want to make the best paper planes, you need to learn from a master. So we asked John Collins, who set the Guinness World Record for farthest flight by a paper aircraft in 2012, to teach us a thing or two about the squash fold and perfect winglets.

name: Little Red Riding Hood
author: Brüder Grimm
description: The author is the French writer Charles Perrault. ＂Little Red Riding Hood＂ is a classic fairy tale created by him, depicting the adventurous journey of a little girl wearing a red hood.

name: Jack and the Beanstalk
author: 作者名字
description: ＂Jack and the Beanstalk＂ is a classic fairy tale written by a British author, depicting the adventurous journey of a young boy named Jack.

name: The Emperor's New Clothes
author: 作者名字
description: The Emperor's New Clothes is a classic fairy tale written by the Danish author Hans Christian Andersen.

name: The Great Adventure of Little Rabbit
author: 作者名字
description: The story of a little rabbit who goes on an adventure and makes new friends.

name: Rapunzel
author: 作者名字
description: Rapunzel is a classic fairy tale written by the German authors Jacob and Wilhelm Grimm. It tells the story of a beautiful girl imprisoned in a tower.

name: Rumpelstiltskin
author: 作者名字
description: Rumpelstiltskin is a classic fairy tale collected by the German authors Jacob and Wilhelm Grimm. It tells the story of a young girl and a mysterious character.

name: Snow White
author: 作者名字
description: Snow White is a classic fairy tale written by the German authors Jacob and Wilhelm Grimm. It tells the story of a beautiful girl who is envied by her wicked stepmother.

name: The Bird and the Whale
author: 作者名字
description: The Bird and the Whale is a heartwarming fairy tale written by the Irish author Orr Rogers. It tells the story of a deep friendship between a bird and a whale.

name: The Little Red Hen
author: 作者名字
description: The Little Red Hen is a classic fairy tale collected by the American author Joseph Jacobs. It tells the story of a hen who, through her own efforts and hard work, plants, harvests, grinds wheat, and ultimately bakes delicious bread.
